entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 20. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
